enum DEFAULT_DEBUG_DIR

Function Documentation

static phpCAS::setDebug ( $  filename = ''  )  [static, inherited]

Set/unset debug mode

Parameters:
$filename  the name of the file used for logging, or FALSE to stop debugging.
Examples:
example_custom_urls.php, example_file.php, example_gateway.php, example_proxy.php, example_proxy2.php, example_service.php, example_session_proxy.php, example_session_service.php, and example_simple.php.
